ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( Walkin_Source__c, 'Channel Partner'),Walkin_Apply_Unregistered_ChannelPartner__c == false), ISBLANK( Walkin_Channel_Partner__c) , false), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Select Walk in Channel Partner
